com.almasb.fxgl.ui

Class UIFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.almasb.fxgl.ui.UIFactory

  • public final class UIFactory
extends Object
    A collection of static methods that return UI controls to unify the look across FXGL.
    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov (AlmasB) (almaslvl@gmail.com)
